content_request: Bienvenue AZOUH
Quelle est l'évolution du ca data par type de souscription

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    rcdm.year AS year,
    rcdm.month AS month,
    rcdm.formule_dmgp AS type_de_souscription,
    SUM(rcdm.ca_data) AS total_ca_data
FROM 
    reporting_ca_data_monthly AS rcdm
JOIN 
    (SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year FROM reporting_ca_data_monthly) AS max_year_subquery 
    ON rcdm.year = max_year_subquery.max_year
WHERE 
    rcdm.formule_dmgp LIKE '%JAMONO%' 
    OR rcdm.formule_dmgp LIKE '%KIRENE%'
    OR rcdm.formule_dmgp LIKE '%AUTRES%'
GROUP BY 
    rcdm.year, 
    rcdm.month, 
    rcdm.formule_dmgp
ORDER BY 
    rcdm.year DESC, 
    rcdm.month DESC, 
    total_ca_data DESC;
Donne moi le Ca des pass internationaux en 2025
Donne moi le Ca des pass internationaux en 2025

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    rcdm.year AS year,
    rcdm.month AS month,
    SUM(rcdm.ca_data) AS total_ca_pass_internationaux
FROM 
    reporting_ca_data_monthly AS rcdm
WHERE 
    rcdm.year = 2025
    AND rcdm.formule_dmgp LIKE '%PASS INTERNATIONAUX%'
GROUP BY 
    rcdm.year, 
    rcdm.month
ORDER BY 
    rcdm.year DESC, 
    rcdm.month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca des pass internationaux en 2025
Donne moi le Ca des souscriptions des pass internationaux en 2025

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    rcdm.year AS year,
    rcdm.month AS month,
    SUM(rcdm.ca_data) AS ca_souscriptions_pass_internationaux
FROM 
    reporting_ca_data_monthly AS rcdm
WHERE 
    rcdm.year = 2025
    AND rcdm.formule_dmgp LIKE '%PASS INTERNATIONAL%'
GROUP BY 
    rcdm.year, 
    rcdm.month
ORDER BY 
    rcdm.year DESC, 
    rcdm.month DESC;

Donne moi le Ca des pass internationaux en 2025

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT 
    reporting_monthly_international.year AS year,
    reporting_monthly_international.month AS month,
    SUM(reporting_monthly_international.ca_data) AS total_revenu
FROM 
    reporting_monthly_international
WHERE 
    reporting_monthly_international.year = 2025
GROUP BY 
    reporting_monthly_international.year, reporting_monthly_international.month
ORDER BY 
    reporting_monthly_international.year DESC, reporting_monthly_international.month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca des pass internationaux en 2025

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    rcdm.year AS year,
    rcdm.month AS month,
    SUM(rcdm.mnt) AS total_revenue
FROM
    reporting_daily_maxit AS rcdm
WHERE
    rcdm.year = 2025
    AND rcdm.categorie = 'Telco'
    AND (rcdm.fonctionnalite LIKE '%PASS SEMAINE ALLO MONDE%' OR rcdm.fonctionnalite LIKE '%PASS VOYAGE ORANGE VOIX EUROPE%')
GROUP BY
    rcdm.year,
    rcdm.month
ORDER BY
    rcdm.year DESC,
    rcdm.month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca des pass internationaux en 2025

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    year AS year,
    month AS month,
    SUM(ca_data) AS international_pass_revenue
FROM
    reporting_ca_data_monthly
WHERE
    year = 2025
    AND (offer_name LIKE '%ALLO MONDE%' OR offer_name LIKE '%VOYAGE ORANGE%' OR types LIKE '%INTERNATIONAL%')
GROUP BY
    year,
    month
ORDER BY
    year DESC,
    month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca illiflex

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    year AS year,
    month AS month,
    SUM(sous_mnt) AS ca_illiflex
FROM
    daily_souscription
WHERE
    types = 'ILLIFLEX'
    AND year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY
    year,
    month
ORDER BY
    year DESC,
    month DESC;
Donne moi le Ca international

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    ds.year AS year,
    ds.month AS month,
    SUM(ds.ca_data + ds.ca_voix) AS international_revenue
FROM
    daily_souscription AS ds
WHERE
    ds.types = 'INTERNATIONAL'
    AND ds.year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY
    ds.year,
    ds.month
ORDER BY
    ds.year DESC,
    ds.month DESC;
Donne moi la répartition du Ca recharge par DRV

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    ms.year AS year,
    ms.month AS month,
    ms.zone_DRV AS zone_DRV,
    SUM(rcm.ca_recharges) AS total_ca_recharges
FROM
    monthly_sortants AS ms
JOIN
    reporting_ca_monthly AS rcm
ON ms.ca_cr_commune = rcm.ca_cr_commune
WHERE ms.year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
AND rcm.year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY
    ms.year,
    ms.month,
    ms.zone_DRV
ORDER BY
    ms.year DESC,
    ms.month DESC;
Donne moi les types et marques d’appareils les plus utilisés par zone
Donne moi les types et marques d’appareils les plus utilisés par zone

-- Requête SQL envoyée :

SELECT
    mt.year AS year,
    mt.month AS month,
    mt.REGION AS region,
    mt.DEPARTEMENT AS departement,
    mt.commune_arrondissement AS commune_arrondissement,
    mt.type_appareil AS type_appareil,
    mt.marque AS marque,
    COUNT(*) AS usage_count
FROM
    monthly_terminaux AS mt
WHERE mt.year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE())
GROUP BY
    mt.year,
    mt.month,
    mt.REGION,
    mt.DEPARTEMENT,
    mt.commune_arrondissement,
    mt.type_appareil,
    mt.marque
ORDER BY
    mt.REGION,
    mt.DEPARTEMENT,
    mt.commune_arrondissement,
    usage_count DESC;
